resources.string: If the checkbox at the upper left hand corner of the screen, shown below, is checked, then yes.

In order to establish a secure connection, both you and the recipient must be using this app. if either party is not using the app, then the message attempting to establish secure connection will be garbage to the person not using this app, and their app will not know how to handle the message.
Who do I contact with questions?
Send an email to example@email.org. We will reply soon.
